page.title: 10"RAINSCOMBE FARM"
page.content: { Rainscombe farm}is{80}acres,which is split into{14}fields.It is a{livestock {farm}with{cows}and{heifers,}they have{70 cows}and{35 heifers.}The{EEC has affected them and they have had to cut their milk by{9\%.} {Two people}work on the farm but someone comes in the morning for four hours.The{market}they use is {Haywards Heath}where their cows and calves are sold.The cows are sold if they don't give any milk.Their oldest cow is{twelve}and they have a cow that weighs{600 kg.}They have got a bull which weighs{700 kg}and its name is Julian.The{fertilisers}they use are {PHOSPHATE,NITROGEN}and sprays for weeds and grass.They need{500-600 tonnes of{silage}to get through the winter.They have {1}calf that was born a little while ago. It weighs about {100kg}and could sell for over{Â£100.
